author: Pure Storage Ansible Team (@sdodsley) <pure-ansible-team@purestorage.com>
description: Configure MOTD for Pure Storage FlashArrays.
This will be shown during an SSH or GUI login to the array.
Multiple line messages can be achieved using \\n.
notes: This module requires the C(purestorage) Python library
You must set C(PUREFA_URL) and C(PUREFA_API) environment variables if I(fa_url) and I(api_token) arguments are not passed to the module directly

description: FlashArray API token for admin privileged user.
Banner text, or MOTD, to use
FlashArray management IPv4 address or Hostname.

doc.short_description: Configure Pure Storage FlashArray GUI and SSH MOTD message

purestorage.flasharray.purefa_banner.examples:
- name: Set new banner text
  purefa_banner:
    banner: "Banner over\ntwo lines"
    state: present
    fa_url: 10.10.10.2
    api_token: e31060a7-21fc-e277-6240-25983c6c4592

- name: Delete banner text
  purefa_banner:
    state: absent
    fa_url: 10.10.10.2
    api_token: e31060a7-21fc-e277-6240-25983c6c4592
